headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KALKSTEIN, GOLDIE B.

snippet: KALKSTEIN--Goldie B.,peacefully on February 13, 2016. Beloved mother, grandmother, sister and aunt. Services were held. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KALKSTEIN--Goldie B.,peacefully on February 13, 2016. Beloved mother, grandmother, sister and aunt. Services were held. 1/3
